content: round 2 k one round with no k2tog k1 k instep in pattern on decreasing and continue the chart n2 k1 ssk k to end of the round for instep knit these 2 rounds until you have decreased to 64 stitches knit foot until 1 5 less than desired foot length for the rounded toe this is a shorter toe rounded toe *k6 k2tog* repeat to end of *k3 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row round k2 row *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of *k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row round k1 row *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row round *k2tog* repeat to end of round there 8 stitches left cut yarn and gather the stitches together to close the opening pull tight no kitchener stitch needed weave in all your ends and block your socks as desired abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together ws wrong side p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place stitch marker ssk slip slip knit co cast on p purl pu pick up k knit n- needle sl slip as if to purl cn cable needle rs right side yo yarn over pattern & photography by olivia villarreal for personal use only pattern support email olive villarreal@yahoo com
